xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 08 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <blink2> has quit 01:57 <fabiocba> has quit 03:20 <vishnu93> has joined #phenotips 03:26 <mcupak> has quit 03:35 <vishnu93> Hi 03:35 <vishnu93> I have a question on editing the xml files of phenotips 03:35 <sdumitriu> Hi vishnu93 03:35 <vishnu93> I modified the patientsheetcode.xml 03:36 <vishnu93> and ran mvn install on that folder which had the POM.xml file 03:36 <vishnu93> but still the changes weren't seen 03:37 <vishnu93> is there any thing missing in my working? 03:38 <sdumitriu> Well, that doesn't end up in the instance you're running 03:38 <sdumitriu> It just builds a .xar file 03:39 <vishnu93> ohh 03:39 <vishnu93> understood 03:39 <sdumitriu> You can either upload that .xar into your running instance, or build the rest of the modules in /resources/ and /distribution/ 03:45 <vishnu93> ok 03:45 <vishnu93> I'll read some more about how projects on maven are built 03:45 <vishnu93> thanks 03:59 <vishnu93> also, one more question 04:00 <vishnu93> this is regarding machine learning modeling for evolution of tumors, will it be done on phenotips? 04:00 <sdumitriu> No 04:00 <sdumitriu> That's a different project 04:03 <vishnu93> ok, I assumed it would be similar to the pedigree chart 04:05 <vishnu93> I think theres a minor typo in RightsUpdateEventListener.java 04:07 <sdumitriu> Which one? 04:07 <vishnu93> In the if condition there should be a not with isGroup(owner) 04:07 <vishnu93> line 149 04:07 <vishnu93> if (owner == null || !(isUser(owner) || isGroup(owner))) { 04:07 <vishnu93> return; 04:07 <vishnu93> } 04:08 <sdumitriu> No, the second ! is distributed: "not ( isOwner || isGroup )" 04:08 <sdumitriu> I mean "not ( isUser || isGroup )" 04:08 <vishnu93> Oh, sorry about that 04:09 <sdumitriu> No problem 04:09 <vishnu93> yeah, got it. Didn't see it carefully 04:46 <kartik_bawa> has quit 05:29 <vishnu93> has quit 06:23 <kartik_bawa> has joined #phenotips 06:23 <kartik_bawa> has left #phenotips 06:24 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 06:30 <kartik_bawa> has quit 06:39 <Ravneet> has quit 08:01 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 08:37 <IonelPopescu> has quit 08:38 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 08:44 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 09:14 <kartik_bawa_> has quit 10:34 <fabiocba> has quit 11:14 <kartik_bawa> has quit 11:14 <qwebirc91883> has quit 11:44 <kartik_bawa> has quit 12:23 <konoval> has quit 12:42 <kartik_bawa> has quit 13:53 <IonelPopescu> has quit 13:58 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 13:59 <blink2> has quit 14:07 <kartik_bawa> has quit 15:23 <kartik_bawa> has quit 15:58 <jpirie> has quit 16:05 <blink2> has quit 16:08 <vadkoz> has joined #phenotips 16:15 <vadkoz> has quit 16:19 <IonelPopescu> has quit 16:25 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 16:52 <IonelPopescu> has quit 19:14 <Guest38811> has quit 19:42 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 19:57 <IonelPopescu> has quit 23:33 <SayAsh> has quit
